segments.text: Julia , why have you prepared a candlelight dinner ? Anything special to celebrate ? Did you get a promotion ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Honey , don't tell me that you forgot our anniversary , did you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , my dear , how can I forget such an important day ? I was just kidding . Look at this box .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , my god . A diamond brooch . It's so beautiful . You're so kind to me , A . Thank you !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You're welcome , honey . I hope we will celebrate our golden wedding anniversary in future .
segments.speaker: S1
